MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW9 postcode area of Northwich. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:52am. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:57am on the 29th April 2021.
